description: This file defines a React functional component named GameControls which provides UI controls for a chess game, including importing/exporting FEN strings, and controlling game flow via new, undo, and redo actions.

methods.name: GameControls
methods.description: React functional component handling game control UI, FEN import/export, and toast notifications.

methods.name: handleImport
methods.description: Validates and attempts to import a FEN string, then updates state and calls onSetFEN if successful.

methods.name: handleExport
methods.description: Copies the current FEN string to clipboard and shows a success or error toast.
